NomaiObject: Ok he doesnt actl die here bc chronology but in my head he basically does 1 YARROW: Plume, stay with us.. The shuttle should be arriving any second now. 2 1 PLUME: There was no hope after all.. I knew better, but I still wanted to hope there was a chance.. 3 2 CASSAVA: This cold is too much for him to bear! He's becoming delirious.. We must try to warm him up however we can! 4 3 PLUME: I came on this expedition in the hopes of finding any sign of survivors who had survived and escaped the bramble's mazes on Dark Bramble's exterior.. But now, I know without a shred of doubt. 5 4 PLUME: Even if they had been able to escape, had they not perished to this piercing cold, stranded on a planet so far from the sun - they would surely have been swept away by Giant's Deep eventually, and perished in the vacuum of space.. 6 5 CASSAVA: Plume, have hope! There is still a chance there could be survivors stowed away somewhere within Dark Bramble; we have not yet begun exploration of the bramble's vast interior yet! 7 6 PLUME: How would we traverse the bramble's maze-like interior with our shuttles? Many good Nomai have already been unquestionably lost to this gruesome planet, young Cassava. We cannot risk more lives, dwelling on those we have lost.. 8 7 PLUME: You can only focus on those who survive, on what remains - and pave the path for those to come... 9 8 PLUME: My gratitude for your patience, Keek... 10 9 PLUME: And my dear Phlox.. I am so sorry to leave you without saying goodbye... My gratitude for choosing me as your father... 11 10 YARROW: Plume! Stay with us! The shuttle is almost here.. Phlox is already on his way here on the shuttle from Brittle Hollow! 12 11 CLARY: The shuttle is here! Help us lift him to the shuttle, everyone - quickly! Plume is in urgent need of medical attention!
